ing: 2 tablespoons vegetable oil, or more to taste
n: Quick Indian Vegetarian Cottage Cheese Breakfast
des: "You are hungry, you don't have a lot of ingredients, but you have cottage cheese. If that's the case, then try this super fast recipe with as few ingredients as you can imagine. It's a quick yet delicious recipe for cheese lovers, vegetarians, or for anyone else. Serve hot with naan, tortilla, or brown bread."
ins:
Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add black peppercorns and coriander seeds. Cook until fragrant, about 30 seconds. Stir in onions and garlic; cook until softened, about 5 minutes. Stir in cilantro, pink peppercorns, and red pepper flakes. Cook and stir until flavors combine, 5 to 8 minutes. Remove from heat.
Stir cottage cheese into the peppercorn mixture. Season with salt and sugar; mix well to combine.
